forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 15C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 59F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
